Furthermore, I'll use social media and online forums to my advantage, posting subtle criticisms and "concerns" about my rival's research under the guise of "scientific debate." I'll make sure to use my real name and credentials to lend credibility to my attacks, and I'll encourage my colleagues and allies to do the same.

If all else fails, I'll resort to more underhanded tactics.
